definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (fr. above √ );—read prob. [[מִתִּשְׁבֵּה גִלְעָד]] (or [[תִּשְׁבֵּי]]) 1Ki 17:1 (for MT [[מִתּשָׁבֵיּ]]) LXX. e)k Qesbw=n (LXXL Qessenw=n) tn=v Galaad, so Jos ; Ew Th We Kmp Benz Kit Burney al. ; home of Elijah ; v. Kasteren:ZPV xiii (1890) 207 ff. cp. mod. Istib, in mts. of Ajhûn, so Buhl:G 257.
